trans-unit.source: PreparedStatement ps2 = conn.prepareStatement( "UPDATE HotelAvailability SET rooms_available = " + "(rooms_available - ?) WHERE hotel_id = ? " + "AND booking_date BETWEEN ? AND ?"); -- this sample code sets the values of dynamic parameters -- to be the values of program variables ps2.setInt(1, numberRooms); ps2.setInt(2, theHotel.hotelId); ps2.setDate(3, arrival); ps2.setDate(4, departure); updateCount = ps2.executeUpdate();
